metadata.description: Synthetic alchemy outputs from recipe inputs 450-500

metadata.narrative: Acceleration draught mixing water's flow with shadow's swiftness. Time bends around the drinker, movements blur into afterimages. The world slows while you race forward.
Basic healing tonic from beetle shells and natural reagents. Every healer's starting formula. Closes minor wounds and stops bleeding within heartbeats.
Refined healing potion using living essence and earth crystals. The liquid remembers vitality and shares it freely. Wounds knit together, bruises fade to memory.
Potent healing elixir from ancient golem cores and pure light. Closes grievous wounds in moments, restores what was lost. Death's grip loosens, life surges back.
Power elixir combining living essence with elemental waters. Muscles surge with unnatural might, every blow strikes like a battering ram. Feel the strength of titans.
Fortification potion from iron scales and essence blood. Skin hardens to steel, bones become unbreakable. Stand firm against any assault.
Velocity draught from air crystals and predator essence. Your body remembers how wolves hunt, how wind races. Move like lightning across the battlefield.
Flame-ward potion using shadow and air to counter heat. Body temperature regulates perfectly against infernos. Walk through dragon fire unscathed.
Ice-ward potion from void essence creating inner warmth. Cold becomes powerless against you. Blizzards feel like gentle breezes, frostbite cannot take hold.
Renewal tonic from ancient cores and lightning essence. Body remembers its perfect state and returns there. Wounds close continuously, vitality flows eternal.

items.name: Regeneration Tonic
items.effect: Restores 75 HP instantly and 5 HP per second

metadata.narrative: Legendary brew combining spectral essence with void and phoenix ash. Maximum vitality surges, strength magnifies beyond mortal limits. Briefly touch divinity itself.
Alchemical transmutation reshaping tin's crystalline structure through fire. Metal becomes more pure, more responsive to enchantment. The old philosophers sought this.

items.name: Tin Ingot
items.effect: Refined tin ingot for crafting and enchanting

metadata.narrative: Advanced transmutation forging steel through alchemical principles. Coal and crystal bind with tin, creating superior alloy. Stronger than sum of parts.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.effect: Refined steel ingot for advanced crafting

metadata.narrative: Purifying iron scales with light to extract pure essence blood. The process removes impurities, concentrates power. What remains pulses with primal vitality.

items.name: Essence Blood
items.effect: Purified essence blood for high-grade potions

metadata.narrative: Crystallizing storm energy into stable fire essence. Lightning's raw power transforms to controlled flame. The crystal remembers both origins, burns with electric heat.

items.name: Fire Crystal
items.effect: Crystallized fire essence for elemental crafting

metadata.narrative: Perfect elemental balance in liquid form. Fire, earth, air, and water harmonize completely. All elements recognize you as kin, refuse to cause harm.

items.name: Elemental Harmony Potion
items.effect: Grants resistance to all elements for 10 minutes

metadata.narrative: Ultimate solvent from shadow, storm, and volcanic glass. Dissolves anything given time. Handle with extreme caution - it hungers to unmake all matter.

items.name: Universal Solvent
items.effect: Can dissolve most materials, use carefully

metadata.narrative: Enhancement oil from ancient cores and elemental water. Tools respond faster, work smoother. Every craftsman's secret advantage.

items.name: Efficiency Oil
items.effect: Apply to tools for +15% gathering speed for 1 hour

metadata.narrative: Protective polish from slime gel and marble dust. Creates lustrous coating that deflects blows. The shine isn't decorative - it's functional armor.

items.name: Armor Polish
items.effect: Apply to armor for +10% defense for 2 hours

metadata.narrative: Phase-shifting potion from storm hearts and void essence. Reality forgets you exist temporarily. Light bends around you, eyes slide past without seeing.
Aquatic adaptation potion from water crystals and living essence. Lungs remember how fish breathe. Dive deep without fear, explore underwater realms freely.
Purification elixir from iron scales and radiant light. Cleanses toxins, neutralizes venom. Body remembers health, rejects corruption.
Arcane restoration potion from crystal quartz and frost essence. Magical energies flow back, spell channels clear. Mind sharpens, power returns.
Legendary transmutation catalyst from gold, lightning, and phoenix ash. The dream of alchemists made real. Transforms base metals to precious, accelerates all reactions.

items.name: Philosopher's Stone
items.effect: Enables advanced transmutations and accelerates alchemy

metadata.narrative: Fury elixir from dire fangs and storm essence. Rational thought fades, primal rage surges. Pain becomes distant, strength multiplies, combat becomes pure instinct.
Simple courage tonic from beetle shells and fire crystals. Fear fades to background noise, resolve strengthens. Not bravery - just chemical confidence.

items.name: Liquid Courage
items.effect: Removes fear effects and grants +10% morale

metadata.narrative: Gravity-defying elixir from air crystals and phoenix ash. Weight becomes suggestion, ground loses its claim. Rise above earthly constraints, drift on unseen currents.
Stabilizing raw lightning into crystalline form. Storm's fury becomes manageable power. The shard crackles eternally, awaiting release.
Speed draught from spectral threads and light essence. Time dilates around you, movements become afterimages. The world crawls while you race forward.
Basic healing tonic from shadow-touched beetle shells. Every healer starts here. Wounds close and pain recedes within moments of drinking.
Improved healing potion using dire essence and fire crystals. The liquid glows faintly with captured vitality. One swallow restores vigor.
Potent healing elixir from lightning-charged cores and crystals. Wounds close rapidly, bones mend, vitality surges. Electric life flows through veins.
Power elixir from tempered living essence and earth crystals. Muscles surge with hardened might, every strike impacts like a warhammer. Strength refined to perfection.
Fortification potion from luminous fire crystals and dire essence. Skin becomes iron, bones turn to steel. Stand immovable against any force.
Velocity draught from ancient cores and charged air. Lightning speed flows through limbs, reactions sharpen beyond natural limits. Move like the storm itself.
Flame-ward potion from tempered air and shadow. Body temperature regulates perfectly even in infernos. Walk through dragonfire like summer breeze.
Ice-ward potion from void essence and luminous earth. Cold becomes powerless, frostbite impossible. Arctic winds feel like gentle cooling.
Renewal tonic from lightning essence and shadow cores. Continuous healing flows through body, wounds close steadily. Regeneration becomes natural state.

items.name: Regeneration Tonic
items.effect: Restores 75 HP instantly and 5 HP per second

metadata.narrative: Legendary brew from tempered essence blood and void. Maximum HP surges beyond natural limits, strength magnifies. Mortality becomes distant memory.
Alchemical transmutation purifying tin through luminous flame. Metal's crystalline structure perfects, magical conductivity increases. Ancient art made repeatable.

items.name: Tin Ingot
items.effect: Refined tin ingot for crafting and enchanting

metadata.narrative: Advanced transmutation creating steel through refined processes. Coal and tin fuse into superior alloy. The result exceeds component quality.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.effect: Refined steel ingot for advanced crafting

metadata.narrative: Purifying brilliant scales with radiant light to extract pure essence. Process concentrates vitality, removes all impurities. What remains pulses with life.

items.name: Essence Blood
items.effect: Purified essence blood for high-grade potions

metadata.narrative: Crystallizing storm's raw power into stable fire essence. Lightning transforms to controlled flame through shale's layers. The crystal burns with electric heat.

items.name: Fire Crystal
items.effect: Crystallized fire essence for elemental crafting

metadata.narrative: Perfect elemental balance from brilliant crystals. Fire, earth, air, water harmonize completely. All elements recognize you as kin.

items.name: Elemental Harmony Potion
items.effect: Grants resistance to all elements for 10 minutes

metadata.narrative: Ultimate solvent from phoenix ash and frost essence. Dissolves anything given time and patience. Handle with extreme caution - it hungers.

items.name: Universal Solvent
items.effect: Can dissolve most materials, use carefully

metadata.narrative: Enhancement oil from polished essence and air crystals. Tools respond faster, work smoother, never tire. Craftsmen guard this formula jealously.

items.name: Efficiency Oil
items.effect: Apply to tools for +15% gathering speed for 1 hour

metadata.narrative: Protective polish from brilliant slime and granite. Creates lustrous coating that deflects attacks. The shine is functional armor, not decoration.

items.name: Armor Polish
items.effect: Apply to armor for +10% defense for 2 hours

metadata.narrative: Phase-shifting potion from lightning shards and void essence. Reality forgets you temporarily. Light bends around you, eyes slide past unseeing.
Aquatic adaptation potion from brilliant air crystals. Lungs remember how fish breathe, water becomes air. Dive deep without drowning fear.
Purification elixir from fire-blessed light and iron scales. Cleanses all toxins, neutralizes any venom. Body remembers purity, rejects corruption.
Arcane restoration potion from vivid water crystals and quartz. Magical energies flow back rapidly, spell channels clear. Mind sharpens, power surges through meridians.
